name: Undeserting
description: While the theme "deserted" might give a desolated vibe, we want to make something relaxing and nostalgic.  Inspired by the game "unpacking", we created a zen puzzle game named "undeserting". Like escape room, the main character woke up on a deserted island and need to find his way out.  To do so, He needs to build a boat by finding all the hidden pieces.
